titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on Boltom H2003, H2004, H2100, H3100, H311.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 10/29/2009--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on Boltom H2003, H2004, H2100, H3100, H311.
